page.title: 11GAMES CHILDREN PLAY 2
page.content:
{Skipping}is a favourite game of girls. This game may be played by three people or more. Two people swing the rope while the other person skips. While the others are waiting they sing a song that the person skips to. This game is good because nobody wins and nobody loses.
The games children play are numerous. If we are not in an energetic mood we might sit down to a game of {Space {Invaders.}It is a game played with a computer. You are a pilot defending the Earth from alien invader spaceships. There are different versions. Sometimes you may be defended by shields. On the other hand you may have to dodge the missiles without protection.
